metadata.title: CVE-2025-0218 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: When batch jobs are executed by pgAgent, a script is created in a temporarydirectory and then executed. In versions of pgAgent prior to 4.2.3, aninsufficiently seeded random number generator is used when generating thedirectory name, leading to the possibility for a local attacker topre-create the directory and thus prevent pgAgent from executing jobs,disrupting scheduled tasks.

criterions.comment: pgagent package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
